item.description:
guest speaker: Rev. Yuijun Lee (Lead Pastor of Chara Community Church in Virginia) #

verse: Nehemiah 3:1-2 #

Context #

The book of Nehemiah is an incredible book bc it connects the old testament to the new testament. This story is written in the context of Isreal being destroyed by Asyria and Babylon. Every single house, living area, market, street, and even the very iconic building of Israel (the temple of Jerusalem) were all annihilated. Nehemiah is about restoring people out of nothing through God’s goodness and faithfulness. Note that in this entire memoir, Nehemiah’s name is never mentioned, not even once. The purpose was to put a focus on the next writer – Luke.
